title: Crime Alert 10.29.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.29.18
description:
The man who helps and films a teen girl hang herself, facing life in prison. Man charged with murdering the Savopoulos family found guilty.   Robert Mueller in dispute with a grand jury witness who refuses to hand over info. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
